subject: WebBased Testing using JUNIT
msgSnippet: Can I do Web Based testing on say, http://lava:8081/mypage by using JUNIT  to click my JSP buttons, fill in texts,  ... and not using httpunit? If there are
messageBody:
Can I do Web Based testing on say, "http://lava:8081/mypage" by using
JUNIT to click my JSP buttons, fill in texts, ...
and not using httpunit?

If there are ways out please reply to this Newbie soon.
